Summary Note:
Mäkinen Koskinen Lehtinen and the RM met at a financial seminar in Zürich. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Mäkinen Koskinen Lehtinen is a 60 year old retired Partner from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Mäkinen Koskinen Lehtinen is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1982, Mäkinen graduated from Lahti Christian Institute with a secondary school diploma.
After that, he went on to study at University of Helsinki until 1988.
Occupation History:
Mäkinen Koskinen Lehtinen is a seasoned professional with over 37 years of experience.
At Equity4u AG, Mäkinen Koskinen Lehtinen held the position of Analyst from 1988 to 1989, developing essential skills in the field.
At Equity4u AG, he held the position of Associate from 1990 to 1994, making significant contributions to the organization.
In 1995, he joined Capvis Equity Partners AG as a Investment Director, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
After 11 years of dedication, he assumed the role of Partner at Partners Group Holding AG in 2000, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1830000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has townhouse located in Chur, worth 2420000 CHF.


Following the passing of his mother, a successful Venture Capitalist, he received an inheritance of 860000 CHF in 2013, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Mäkinen as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
